text: I am facing same issue and still it 's not resolved
<@U02EKLY52VD> How can I resolved there Issue?

Does anyone know how to resize the image URL if you are using the JS callback on a related post function related_blog_posts? I added a width and I noticed that didn't add srcset either so it is is loading in a super large image. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/creating-a-related-post-listing#display-posts-with-the-tag-sales-enablement-restricted-to-a-specific-publish-date-time-frame|https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/creating-a-related-post-listing#display-posts-with-the-tag-sales-[…]-specific-publish-date-time-frame>
Can you specify what you mean by events in this context? Do you have an example?

Events is one of the custom objects. Ideally I would like to be able to create a module where I can select which custom object to retrieve information from and it would then display all the listings on a webpage from that custom object

> Events is one of the custom objects
Do you mean Marketing Events like conferences?

Thanks Bradley. I’m having problems locating where the code for the radius is located….still learning. Does it depend on the developer of where it’s found or typically in the same place for something like that?
It'll be in the module's html, in a <style> tag. But yeah depends on the developer

After chatting with <@U018HJB7F2R> my interpretation is that she wants to display filtered custom object properties on a webpage. I am not a developer myself so I will leave it in the hands of this community to help her answer this question and will message a few other experts directly to see if they can help.
